main.name: Meg Rydzewski
main.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, React, MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Git, GitHub, Version Control (kanban)
main.bio: Full Stack Web Developer with a background in Retail and Finance and a life-long dedication to learning. Effective at combining creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly applications. Proficient in the MERN Stack; flexible, fast learner bringing curiosity and passion to every project. Enthusiastic and encouraging on a team but also able to work well independently.
main.contactmessage: Let me know how I can help you!

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, jQuery, Bootstrap, Ajax, Node.js, MongoDB/mLab/Robo3T, mySql, Firebase, Visual Studio Code, Git, Git Bash, GitHub (with kanban version control), Heroku, GitHub Pages

education.degree: Bootcamp Certificate: Full Stack Web Development (May 2019)
education.description: A 12-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

education.school: Columbia Business School (Columbia University, NY, NY)
education.description: Post graduation, successfully transitioned to a new career in equity research.
Post graduation, secured a job in merchandise planning in NYC.

work.title: Owner and Founder
work.description: Built the business from the bottom up, including retail space renovations, all licensing and permitting, POS and web store system establishment and administration, purchasing, hiring and training, inventory management, payroll, and business analysis. Customer and vendor-facing every day.

projects.title: Tag This App
projects.category: This MERN app allows admin to create, update, and delete items for a neighborhood tag sale. Shoppers can see the available inventory and favorite the items they are interested in.  Tech used: React.js, MongoDB, S3, Passport, Express Sessions, Bootstrap and barcodes. See the code on GitHub!

projects.title: Clicky Cat App
projects.category: A cat-themed memory game built with React.js. See the code on GitHub!

projects.title: Meyers Gigs
projects.category: A personality-based job hunting site. See the code on GitHub!
